FuncDef:
The display rip statistics interface command displays statistics on a RIP interface, including the statistics of packets sent and received by the interface.
The display ripng statistics interface command displays statistics about a RIPng interface, including the number of packets sent or received by the interface. The display rip statistics interface command displays statistics on a RIP interface, including the statistics of packets sent and received by the interface. The display ripng statistics interface command displays statistics about a RIPng interface, including the number of packets sent or received by the interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays statistics on all RIP interfaces.
-

The value is in dotted decimal notation.
